name: The Killbox: Arena Combat
description: Jump into this real-time, open eSports mobile shooter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 – 32 bit Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 260x DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 – 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
